mapper.select: select APPLY_NO, APPLY_SOURCE, PROD_NO, PROD_SUB_NO, APPLY_STATUS, SYNDICATED_LOAN, CHANNAL_CODE, APPLY_RESULT, APPLY_RESULT_DESC, ARTIFICIAL_FLAG, APPROVE_TYPE, APPROVE_RESULT, AWORD_RESULT_CODE, MOBILE_PHONE_NO, CUST_NO, CUST_NAME, CUST_SEX, CUST_AGE, MARITAL_STATUS, HOUSE_SITUATION, BANK_CARD_TYPE, BANK_CARD_NO, ID_TYPE, ID_NO, FIRST_ID_PROVINCE_CODE, FIRST_ID_PROVINCE, FIRST_ID_CITY_CODE, FIRST_ID_CITY, ID_FRONT_IMG_URL, ID_BACK_IMG_URL, LIVING_IMGURL_ONE, DEGREE, SCHOOL_NAME, MAJOR_NAME, REMARK, TOKEN, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, VERSION, ARTIFICIAL_DATE, ARTIFICIAL_TIME, AWORD_RESULT, RISK_PRICING, CASE_TYPE, APPLY_RANDOM_NO, PIID, QUEUE_DATE, QUEUE_TIME, PROMOTION_CHANNEL, APPLY_ID, MANUAL_CAUSE_CODE, IMAGE_ENV, FINALRESULT_COMPANY, APPROVE_COMPANY, MANUAL_APPROVE_LEVEL, INTERVAL_DAYS, APPLY_TIME, ACCESS_CHANNEL from crs.trx_apply_info where APPLY_NO = #{applyNo}

select APPLY_NO, APPLY_SOURCE, PROD_NO, PROD_SUB_NO, APPLY_STATUS, SYNDICATED_LOAN, CHANNAL_CODE, APPLY_RESULT, APPLY_RESULT_DESC, ARTIFICIAL_FLAG, APPROVE_TYPE, APPROVE_RESULT, AWORD_RESULT_CODE, MOBILE_PHONE_NO, CUST_NO, CUST_NAME, CUST_SEX, CUST_AGE, MARITAL_STATUS, HOUSE_SITUATION, BANK_CARD_TYPE, BANK_CARD_NO, ID_TYPE, ID_NO, FIRST_ID_PROVINCE_CODE, FIRST_ID_PROVINCE, FIRST_ID_CITY_CODE, FIRST_ID_CITY, ID_FRONT_IMG_URL, ID_BACK_IMG_URL, LIVING_IMGURL_ONE, DEGREE, SCHOOL_NAME, MAJOR_NAME, REMARK, TOKEN, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, VERSION, ARTIFICIAL_DATE, ARTIFICIAL_TIME, AWORD_RESULT, RISK_PRICING, CASE_TYPE, APPLY_RANDOM_NO, PIID, QUEUE_DATE, QUEUE_TIME, PROMOTION_CHANNEL, APPLY_ID, MANUAL_CAUSE_CODE, IMAGE_ENV, FINALRESULT_COMPANY, APPROVE_COMPANY, MANUAL_APPROVE_LEVEL, INTERVAL_DAYS, APPLY_TIME, ACCESS_CHANNEL from crs.trx_apply_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select APPLY_NO, APPLY_SOURCE, PROD_NO, PROD_SUB_NO, APPLY_STATUS, SYNDICATED_LOAN, CHANNAL_CODE, APPLY_RESULT, APPLY_RESULT_DESC, ARTIFICIAL_FLAG, APPROVE_TYPE, APPROVE_RESULT, AWORD_RESULT_CODE, MOBILE_PHONE_NO, CUST_NO, CUST_NAME, CUST_SEX, CUST_AGE, MARITAL_STATUS, HOUSE_SITUATION, BANK_CARD_TYPE, BANK_CARD_NO, ID_TYPE, ID_NO, FIRST_ID_PROVINCE_CODE, FIRST_ID_PROVINCE, FIRST_ID_CITY_CODE, FIRST_ID_CITY, ID_FRONT_IMG_URL, ID_BACK_IMG_URL, LIVING_IMGURL_ONE, DEGREE, SCHOOL_NAME, MAJOR_NAME, REMARK, TOKEN, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, VERSION, ARTIFICIAL_DATE, ARTIFICIAL_TIME, AWORD_RESULT, RISK_PRICING, CASE_TYPE, APPLY_RANDOM_NO, PIID, QUEUE_DATE, QUEUE_TIME, PROMOTION_CHANNEL, APPLY_ID, MANUAL_CAUSE_CODE, IMAGE_ENV, FINALRESULT_COMPANY, APPROVE_COMPANY, MANUAL_APPROVE_LEVEL, INTERVAL_DAYS, APPLY_TIME, ACCESS_CHANNEL from crs.trx_apply_info where APPLY_STATUS != 100
mapper.insert: insert into crs.trx_apply_info(APPLY_SOURCE, PROD_NO, PROD_SUB_NO, APPLY_STATUS, SYNDICATED_LOAN, CHANNAL_CODE, APPLY_RESULT, APPLY_RESULT_DESC, ARTIFICIAL_FLAG, APPROVE_TYPE, APPROVE_RESULT, AWORD_RESULT_CODE, MOBILE_PHONE_NO, CUST_NO, CUST_NAME, CUST_SEX, CUST_AGE, MARITAL_STATUS, HOUSE_SITUATION, BANK_CARD_TYPE, BANK_CARD_NO, ID_TYPE, ID_NO, FIRST_ID_PROVINCE_CODE, FIRST_ID_PROVINCE, FIRST_ID_CITY_CODE, FIRST_ID_CITY, ID_FRONT_IMG_URL, ID_BACK_IMG_URL, LIVING_IMGURL_ONE, DEGREE, SCHOOL_NAME, MAJOR_NAME, REMARK, TOKEN, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_TIME, VERSION, ARTIFICIAL_DATE, ARTIFICIAL_TIME, AWORD_RESULT, RISK_PRICING, CASE_TYPE, APPLY_RANDOM_NO, PIID, QUEUE_DATE, QUEUE_TIME, PROMOTION_CHANNEL, APPLY_ID, MANUAL_CAUSE_CODE, IMAGE_ENV, FINALRESULT_COMPANY, APPROVE_COMPANY, MANUAL_APPROVE_LEVEL, INTERVAL_DAYS, APPLY_TIME, ACCESS_CHANNEL) values (#{applySource}, #{prodNo}, #{prodSubNo}, #{applyStatus}, #{syndicatedLoan}, #{channalCode}, #{applyResult}, #{applyResultDesc}, #{artificialFlag}, #{approveType}, #{approveResult}, #{awordResultCode}, #{mobilePhoneNo}, #{custNo}, #{custName}, #{custSex}, #{custAge}, #{maritalStatus}, #{houseSituation}, #{bankCardType}, #{bankCardNo}, #{idType}, #{idNo}, #{firstIdProvinceCode}, #{firstIdProvince}, #{firstIdCityCode}, #{firstIdCity}, #{idFrontImgUrl}, #{idBackImgUrl}, #{livingImgurlOne}, #{degree}, #{schoolName}, #{majorName}, #{remark}, #{token}, #{createDate}, #{createTime}, #{updateDate}, #{updateTime}, #{version}, #{artificialDate}, #{artificialTime}, #{awordResult}, #{riskPricing}, #{caseType}, #{applyRandomNo}, #{piid}, #{queueDate}, #{queueTime}, #{promotionChannel}, #{applyId}, #{manualCauseCode}, #{imageEnv}, #{finalresultCompany}, #{approveCompany}, #{manualApproveLevel}, #{intervalDays}, #{applyTime}, #{accessChannel})
mapper.update:
update crs.trx_apply_info
APPLY_SOURCE = #{applySource},
PROD_NO = #{prodNo},
PROD_SUB_NO = #{prodSubNo},
APPLY_STATUS = #{applyStatus},
SYNDICATED_LOAN = #{syndicatedLoan},
CHANNAL_CODE = #{channalCode},
APPLY_RESULT = #{applyResult},
APPLY_RESULT_DESC = #{applyResultDesc},
ARTIFICIAL_FLAG = #{artificialFlag},
APPROVE_TYPE = #{approveType},
APPROVE_RESULT = #{approveResult},
AWORD_RESULT_CODE = #{awordResultCode},
MOBILE_PHONE_NO = #{mobilePhoneNo},
CUST_NO = #{custNo},
CUST_NAME = #{custName},
CUST_SEX = #{custSex},
CUST_AGE = #{custAge},
MARITAL_STATUS = #{maritalStatus},
HOUSE_SITUATION = #{houseSituation},
BANK_CARD_TYPE = #{bankCardType},
BANK_CARD_NO = #{bankCardNo},
ID_TYPE = #{idType},
ID_NO = #{idNo},
FIRST_ID_PROVINCE_CODE = #{firstIdProvinceCode},
FIRST_ID_PROVINCE = #{firstIdProvince},
FIRST_ID_CITY_CODE = #{firstIdCityCode},
FIRST_ID_CITY = #{firstIdCity},
ID_FRONT_IMG_URL = #{idFrontImgUrl},
ID_BACK_IMG_URL = #{idBackImgUrl},
LIVING_IMGURL_ONE = #{livingImgurlOne},
DEGREE = #{degree},
SCHOOL_NAME = #{schoolName},
MAJOR_NAME = #{majorName},
REMARK = #{remark},
TOKEN = #{token},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime},
VERSION = #{version},
ARTIFICIAL_DATE = #{artificialDate},
ARTIFICIAL_TIME = #{artificialTime},
AWORD_RESULT = #{awordResult},
RISK_PRICING = #{riskPricing},
CASE_TYPE = #{caseType},
APPLY_RANDOM_NO = #{applyRandomNo},
PIID = #{piid},
QUEUE_DATE = #{queueDate},
QUEUE_TIME = #{queueTime},
PROMOTION_CHANNEL = #{promotionChannel},
APPLY_ID = #{applyId},
MANUAL_CAUSE_CODE = #{manualCauseCode},
IMAGE_ENV = #{imageEnv},
FINALRESULT_COMPANY = #{finalresultCompany},
APPROVE_COMPANY = #{approveCompany},
MANUAL_APPROVE_LEVEL = #{manualApproveLevel},
INTERVAL_DAYS = #{intervalDays},
APPLY_TIME = #{applyTime},
ACCESS_CHANNEL = #{accessChannel},
where APPLY_NO = #{applyNo}
